description: Episode number 1 of Series "Disordered Mind". The case of a successful 34 year old insurance salesman whose inner conflicts trigger a heart attack. The patient talks with Dr. Harold N. Segall, who describes the damage to the heart. The patient is interviewed by psychiatrist Dr. Henry Kravitz and a clear picture of the patient's emotional background emerges bearing directly on the heart attack.
